sentences.sContent: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
sentences.sContent_eng: I brought her proficiency up to the required level.
sentences.sCn: 我把她的熟练程度提高到所规定的水平。

sentences.sContent: How do you think your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.sContent_eng: How do you think your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.sCn: 你认为你的书面英语和口语熟练程度如何?。

sentences.sContent: How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.sContent_eng: How do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English?
sentences.sCn: 你认为你的书面英语和口头英语熟练程度如何？

phrases.pCn: 能力验证；技术检查；熟练测试

trans.tranOther: a good standard of ability and skill
